#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,i,z;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int a[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>a[i];
		for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
		{
			if(i%2==0)
			{
				if(a[i]>a[i+1])
				{
					z=a[i];
					a[i]=a[i+1];
					a[i+1]=z;
				}
			}
				else if(i%2==1)
			{
				if(a[i]<a[i+1])
				{
					z=a[i];
					a[i]=a[i+1];
					a[i+1]=z;
				}
			}
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cout<<a[i]<<" ";
		cout<<endl;
	}
}
